ComicInfo.Title: Snake in the Grass Part 3
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake in the Grass Part 3: Cutter and Deep Six flood the Broca Beach facility with water and seal the B.A.T.S. inside. Dr. Biggles-Jones shoots Bombstrike in the head and has the Red Shadows deposit her body in the desert but she revives, the bullet having skidding off her scalp. Dawn meets Storm Shadow in New York. The Jugglers send a drone to kill Faoud but Claire tricks the drone, saving Faoud. Duke and Roadblock arrive to save Claire and capture Faoud alive but the Jugglers activate an assassin to prevent them.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 20:30:12. [CVDB550389] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:27. [Issue ID 1625524]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Rauch,John Royale,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Bombstrike,Duke,Polly,Dr. Cassandra Knox,Storm Shadow,Dawn Moreno,Deep Six,Eddie O'Leary,G.I. Joe [Cutter,Roadblock],Torpedo,Dr. Sidney Biggles-Jones],Claire Hauser,Faoud,Cobra [B.A.T.S.,Shipwreck,Red Shadows [Black Major]
